attributes.action: Waive immigration rules for those fleeing Ukraine
attributes.additional_details: Supporting Ukraine and yes people is a moral imperative. We cannot expect our European neighbours to lead on this alone. The UK must stand with our neighbours and allies.
attributes.background: Ukraine, a peaceful sovereign nation, is under unprovoked attack. It is imperative that we do everything we can to help the people of Ukraine - whether they choose to stay or to leave. For the latter, we must remove any barrier to entry for Ukrainian refugees, immediately.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Help Ukrainian refugees and create a safe path for them to get to the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609574

Grant Ukrainian citizens fleeing the war full rights to live and work in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609434
